title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone.

title: One Piece
description: A boy with stretchy powers sets out to find the One Piece treasure.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Warriors with incredible powers defend Earth from powerful enemies.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a notebook that allows him to kill anyone.

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Teenagers pilot giant robots to protect Earth from mysterious beings.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy searches for his father who is a legendary Hunter.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
description: A prince gains a power that compels anyone to obey his orders.

title: My Hero Academia
description: A boy without superpowers enrolls in an academy for heroes.

title: Berserk
description: A lone mercenary battles his way through a medieval world filled with demons.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.
